about_the_game:
If you enjoy our game, and you want to contribute to the ongoing development, this pack is the best way you can express your support to our team!
In return, you will receive:

  • Digital soundtrack - 18 atmospheric tracks by Paweł Perepilica and Norihiko Hibino (it will be expanded with the addition of new tracks)
  • Two unique items: Hired Blade Cowl & Azure Cape (these items don’t offer any significant gameplay advantages)

In the future the Supporter Pack will also be expanded with:

  • Digital artbook
  • Digital manual
  • And much more...

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Fantasy Violence, Cartoonish Gore, Depiction of Alcohol & Drug Usage, Mature Topics.

name: Stoneshard - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 or equivalent
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 512 Mb or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 512 Mb or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
